entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
